title: Minecraft 黄色字怎么修改,要详细,坐等回复!
author: Muguang169
txt_content:
BO$P6GBYJLJCG~SU]2K@E2R.jpg (17.93 KB, 下载次数: 4)

replies.author: y342900
replies.txt_content: 打开minecraft目录.minecraft、minecraft.jar、title、splashes.txt  就在splashes记事本改就行了

replies.author: Muguang169
replies.txt_content:
y342900 发表于 2014-3-26 13:18
打开minecraft目录.minecraft、minecraft.jar、title、splashes.txt  就在splashes记事本改就行了 ...
